name: Roll Out!
description:
A simple game made with unity engine in two weeks of part-time work.

Roll Out! is like a parkour (like) game where you have to avoid obstacles and reach the end goal.

Features:

  1.  LEVEL MODE! which features 50 levels (if you can't find the rest of the levels in the level select screen just swipe from right to left in the levels area).
  2.  ENDLESS MODE! where you can endlessly play until you die with randomly generated levels.
  3.  CONTROLLER SUPPORT! (except for menus and level select screen Sorry for that).
  4.  SCORE SYSTEM! which calculates the time + the score you get from close calls with obstacles.
  5. OBSTACLE TYPES! like falling spikes, hammers and MORE!

Controls:

Keyboard and mouse :  WAD or Arrow keys to move, Space to jump, escape to pause, R to retry(only if you died), Enter or Return to go to next level (only if you won).

controller:  Left joystick to move, X to jump, O to retry (only if you died), square to pause, triangle to go to next level (only if you won).

That's all. Thanks for checking it out, my name is Yassine Shehab and i am a solo developer currently by the name of "NoName Games".
